ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.singletons

Class Buffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.singletons.Buffer

  • public class Buffer
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Buffer. Singleton. This class handles when a question is favorited & unfavorited while the Favorites fragment is active, or when a questions marked or unmarked as added to the reading list while the ReadingList fragment is active. (b/c we can't remove(unfavorite) a question from a list that's currently being displayed on the current screen via an adapter) This is in case the user unfavorites then favorites the same question again while in the Favorites fragment (in this case the buffer does not remove the question from the list), analogous for the reading list.
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Group 10
